database.name: VIEW SWA_RELATION_INOUT_PICKING
database.view: SELECT COALESCE(i.m_inout_id) || pick.obwpl_pickinglist_id AS swa_relation_inout_picking_id, i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, to_char('Y') AS isactive, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.created, i.createdby, i.m_inout_id, i.documentno, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.m_warehouse_id, pick.documentno AS pickingdocumentno, pick.created AS pickingcreateddate, CASE WHEN pick.em_swa_c_order_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT c_order.created FROM c_order WHERE c_order.c_order_id = pick.em_swa_c_order_id) WHEN pick.em_swa_requerepo_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT swa_requerimientoreposicion.created FROM swa_requerimientoreposicion WHERE swa_requerimientoreposicion.swa_requerimientoreposicion_id = pick.em_swa_requerepo_id) WHEN pick.em_swa_m_production_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT m_production.created FROM m_production WHERE m_production.m_production_id = pick.em_swa_m_production_id) WHEN pick.em_swa_rtv_c_order_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT c_order.created FROM c_order WHERE c_order.c_order_id = pick.em_swa_rtv_c_order_id) ELSE pick.created END AS datedocumentsource FROM m_inoutline iol JOIN m_inout i ON iol.m_inout_id = i.m_inout_id JOIN obwpl_pickinglist pick ON iol.em_obwpl_pickinglist_id = pick.obwpl_pickinglist_id WHERE i.issotrx = 'Y' GROUP BY i.m_inout_id, pick.obwpl_pickinglist_id, i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.created, i.createdby, i.documentno, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.m_warehouse_id, pick.documentno, pick.created, pick.em_swa_c_order_id, pick.em_swa_requerepo_id, pick.em_swa_m_production_id, pick.em_swa_rtv_c_order_id
